com.sterlingcommerce.ui.web.framework.extensions

Interface ISCUISessionAware

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    ISCUIAuthenticationProvider, ISCUIAuthorizationProvider, ISCUIAutoGuestLoginProvider, ISCUIGuestUserProvider, ISCUIHttpSessionAware, ISCUILoginPageProvider, ISCUIPostAuthenticationProvider, ISCUIRequestValidator, ISCUISecureCookieProvider, ISCUISecureTokenGenerator, ISCUITransactionContextFactory
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    SCUIAdditionalThemeSupport, SCUIAuthenticationProvider, SCUIAuthorizationProvider, SCUICSRFTokenGenerator, SCUICSRFTokenValidator, SCUIDirectAccessValidator, SCUIHttpSessionListener, SCUISecureCookieProvider, SCUISecureTokenGenerator, SCUITransactionContextFactory

    public interface ISCUISessionAware
    Any class that implements this interface or any interface that extends this interface will be in turn dependent on the session validity. This interface are the listeners in SCUISessionListener. When the session is invalidated these listeners are notified and sessionDestroyed() is called. rasrinivasan

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void sessionDestroyed(javax.servlet.http.HttpSessionEvent sessionEvent)
      This method will be called when a session is destroyed.

    • Method Detail

      • sessionDestroyed

        void sessionDestroyed(javax.servlet.http.HttpSessionEvent sessionEvent)
        This method will be called when a session is destroyed. Factory can choose to perform some actions in that case. sessionEvent of the type HttpSessionEvent
